channel.title: The New York Times Trends
channel.description: 用中文浏览纽约时报热门报道

item.title: Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, Mary J. Blige and 50 Cent asserted the power of hip-hop’s oldies generation on pop music’s most-watched stage, our critic @joncaramanica writes of the Super Bowl halftime show. https://t.co/JfbKg2B16H

During the Super Bowl halftime show, Eminem took a knee and held his head after performing “Lose Yourself,” his anthem about self-determination from the movie “8 Mile.” An NFL spokesman said the league was aware that he was planning to kneel. https://t.co/ZMZC0IMc0d

An American Airlines flight from Los Angeles to Washington, D.C., made an emergency landing in Kansas City, Mo., after a passenger tried to break into the cockpit and then tried to open an exit door, witnesses said. He has been taken into custody. https://t.co/hGsD4Pfe3o

Russia has continued to strengthen its military presence around Ukraine. New Russian deployments in Crimea, Belarus and near eastern Ukraine have furthered fears of an imminent invasion. Here's a look at where the troops are positioned. https://t.co/sGuw6amZgh

Breaking News: Kamila Valieva, the Russian figure skating star at the center of a doping scandal, will be allowed to continue competing in the #Beijing2022 Olympics. https://t.co/vQoJ1goYzi https://t.co/CA4Q9czGzv

With a lyrical, flowing performance, Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron 🇫🇷 took the ice dancing gold for France at the #Beijing2022 Olympics.
They skated in such unison that there appeared at times to be one skater on the ice instead of two. https://t.co/bk53v79dDX https://t.co/wWwSKN58bo

Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Kendrick Lamar, Mary J. Blige and 50 Cent asserted the power of hip-hop’s oldies generation on pop music’s most-watched stage, our critic @joncaramanica writes of the Super Bowl halftime show. https://t.co/aPkbMHjg4Q
Taking a 90-minute walk, jog or bike ride after your next Covid or flu vaccine might amplify the benefits of the shot, according to a new study.https://t.co/QObhrHqKdQ

Dr. Dre, Snoop Dogg, Kendrick Lamar, Mary J. Blige and 50 Cent delivered a Super Bowl halftime performance heavy on nostalgia and California pride. Eminem knelt and held his head as he finished "Lose Yourself." https://t.co/8FXs80aZCX

The Super Bowl halftime show on Sunday will feature Dr. Dre, Eminem, Snoop Dogg and Kendrick Lamar, marking the first time that hip-hop sits firmly at the center of the annual spectacle. The genre has taken a roundabout path to get there. https://t.co/Os9ODiwUT6

A Pennsylvania man who hosted what he described as “the alt-right’s favorite firearms-related podcast” was, along with his father, indicted on several gun charges, including owning machine guns and unregistered silencers, according to federal prosecutors. https://t.co/cBX6JrtEQs

A band of anti-Trump Republicans led by Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky is quietly maneuvering to bring allies to Washington and thwart Donald Trump’s bid to retain his hold on the GOP.
The plan is so far yielding mixed results. https://t.co/L9Sc5JUk2v
Chimpanzees have been observed putting flying insects on their wounds. A new report suggests they could be using them to treat injuries.https://t.co/nCMXlShGIH

Rudy Giuliani, who helped lead the effort to overturn the results of the 2020 election, is in talks with the Jan. 6 panel about testifying, according to people familiar with the matter. https://t.co/8yqcFS4XHs

Erin Jackson 🇺🇸 won gold in the women’s 500-meter speedskating race at #Beijing2022, ending a U.S. drought.
She is the first African American woman to medal in the sport. https://t.co/o6twSzasyY https://t.co/6nj1XFf1em

President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine continued to play down U.S. warnings of an imminent Russian invasion, urging calm and saying he had not seen intelligence showing that Moscow was poised to attack. https://t.co/Z1tbQrvHlO

Breaking News: Erin Jackson 🇺🇸 won gold in the women’s 500-meter speedskating race at #Beijing2022, ending a U.S. drought.
She is the first African American woman to medal in the sport. https://t.co/oW72gBzNzT https://t.co/7clVWEtOe9

Breaking News: Canadian police are arresting protesters near Ontario’s Ambassador Bridge, a vital U.S. crossing and major site of recent demonstrations.
Follow our updates. https://t.co/lY4kiX4zWZ

One grocery store worker sells his blood plasma to make ends meet. Another was evicted after struggling to pay her rent. This is the reality for many Kroger employees, who say they can’t afford basic living expenses on their wages from the chain.
https://t.co/wh6j0QIrvK

Misinformation has been a key weapon of Canada’s protest movement, and critics of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau have returned to one simmering conspiracy theory: That Trudeau is Fidel Castro's son. That's false. https://t.co/wEEMPLZ11s
Breaking News: Canadian police officers on Saturday moved in to clear protesters at a vital bridge in Windsor, Ontario, connecting Canada and the U.S. Follow for live updates. https://t.co/gtYAeLs9B3

Far from a head bump that might have been shrugged off, Bob Saget’s autopsy report described an unmistakably serious set of injuries that would at the very least have probably left someone confused, brain experts said. https://t.co/Tycv37EyYI

French police pushed marchers off roadways, towed vehicles and fired tear gas at protesters blocking traffic on the Champs-Élysées in Paris on Saturday. Hundreds of vehicles emulating protests in Canada evaded police checkpoints around the French capital. https://t.co/BQgwavaXAK https://t.co/ETJw1a6xsi

By releasing declassified intelligence about Russian moves against Ukraine, the Biden administration hopes to disrupt Moscow's plans and make it harder for President Vladimir Putin to justify an invasion. https://t.co/gBjHUKyEsT

Benedict Cumberbatch received a best-actor nomination for his portrayal of a meanspirited cowboy in "The Power of the Dog." Some critics have called it a performance of a lifetime, but he says "there’s a lot of life to still give." https://t.co/IpJpWey5Sf

Coronavirus booster shots lose much of their potency after about four months, raising the possibility that some people may need a fourth dose, new CDC data suggest. https://t.co/MlqX9vGNW5 https://t.co/SpVYp0soy5
This is how you make the best scrambled eggs. https://t.co/7Pjdb5pgHk https://t.co/Mp8HUSSsUz

The Pentagon has ordered 3,000 more troops to Poland, bringing the total number of reinforcements sent to Europe in the past two weeks to 5,000. The move will be to reassure NATO allies that the U.S. would protect them from Russian aggression. https://t.co/Y6LBqiEjTP
Lindsey Jacobellis and Nick Baumgartner, the two oldest U.S. snowboarders in Beijing, won the first gold medal in mixed team cross. https://t.co/KU9X7UE710

Doug Ford, the premier of Ontario, warned that protesters who did not clear transit routes could face a maximum penalty of $100,000, up to a year in prison and the potential loss of commercial and personal licenses. https://t.co/BcbXXwhHl5 https://t.co/Bc2h50sQNw

The koala has been declared an endangered species by the Australian government.
Drought, bush fires, disease and habitat loss have drastically reduced the numbers of the iconic marsupial. https://t.co/xqPRsylG0c https://t.co/4a6TLWMZoM

As protests stretch on in Canada and truckers block supply chains with the U.S., some Canadians are asking: Why hasn’t Prime Minister Justin Trudeau ordered the authorities to quash the demonstrations? https://t.co/OZ72MKY8wE
Breaking News: An Ontario court has ordered demonstrators to clear the Ambassador Bridge, a critical link at the U.S.-Canada border. https://t.co/wT610TxmNq

The Ukrainian Olympian Vladyslav Heraskevych 🇺🇦 held up a “no war in Ukraine” sign after his run in the men’s skeleton competition on Friday. “It’s my position, so I fight for that. I fight for peace,” he told the AP after the event. https://t.co/yJ6AsTM2ir
Coronavirus booster shots lose much of their potency after about four months, raising the possibility that some people may need a fourth dose, new CDC data suggest. https://t.co/UihLT8iiUz
Luc Montagnier, a French virologist who shared a Nobel Prize for discovering the virus that causes AIDS, has died. He was 89. https://t.co/E5f4NaieAm
Breaking News: The Biden administration warned of an immediate threat of Russia beginning a full-scale invasion of Ukraine. https://t.co/5nQgP7j95s

Breaking News: President Biden is moving to split $7 billion in frozen Afghan central bank assets between 9/11 victims’ families and humanitarian aid in Afghanistan. The highly unusual set of moves is expected to be announced on Friday. https://t.co/tMqWbm9oBx

The koala has officially been declared an endangered species by the Australian government.
Drought, bush fires, disease and habitat loss have drastically reduced the numbers of the iconic marsupial. https://t.co/L6ukFxmeF0
Breaking News: Ayumu Hirano 🇯🇵 won gold for Japan in the men’s snowboarding halfpipe at #Beijing2022, while Shaun White 🇺🇸 finished fourth to cap his storied Olympics career. https://t.co/rsnDEQOido

Shaun White 🇺🇸 finished his final Olympic snowboarding run, a tear in his eye, and waved to the #Beijing2022 crowd. There would be no medal.
He fell on his second trick, got to his feet and slid slowly into the embrace of cheering fans. https://t.co/HWl5Zri0B8 https://t.co/sTQvTyHTzn

Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 won gold at #Beijing2022 with a free skate set to an Elton John medley.
His jet-fueled jumps and a performance that raised goose bumps gave him the victory over his Japanese rivals. https://t.co/pZrQz9BxTi

Wolves will regain federal protection across 44 of the lower 48 states after a judge overturned a Trump-era decision that removed them from the Endangered Species List. https://t.co/asZhp5iYmR https://t.co/z2tqqtpKlB
Wolves will regain federal protection across 44 of the lower 48 states after a judge overturned a Trump-era decision that removed them from the Endangered Species List. https://t.co/DbYIpbhXdY

The National Archives and Records Administration discovered what it believed was classified information in documents Donald Trump had taken with him from the White House as he left office, according to a person briefed on the matter. https://t.co/V93byxoOFI

A geomagnetic storm triggered by a recent outburst of the sun destroyed up to 40 new SpaceX satellites.
They are drifting back into Earth’s atmosphere, where they will burn up, potentially costing the company about $100 million. https://t.co/3fa6R8Uj21
Breaking News: Jan. 6 investigators have found gaps in White House phone records during the Capitol riot, when they know Donald Trump was making calls. https://t.co/fmZsm8LVgN

Figure skating in the U.S. is now plainly an Asian American sport.
For the second consecutive Winter Games, four of the six figure skaters representing the U.S. in the singles events are Asian American: Karen Chen, Nathan Chen, Alysa Liu and Vincent Zhou. https://t.co/XxU7wkUxMp https://t.co/aoIznhBw2v

How did Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 become an Olympic champion? Unlike at the 2018 Winter Games, Chen said he wanted to appreciate the Beijing 2022 #Olympics experience, win or lose.
It worked. 🥇 https://t.co/b3nD4rzBS8 https://t.co/kpMMcPIb3R

Nathan Chen 🇺🇸 just took to the ice at #Beijing2022, skating to an Elton John medley of "Rocket Man," "Goodbye Yellow Brick Road," and "Bennie and the Jets."
Follow along live: https://t.co/oHSdyAc2LQ
